General.Name: Hall of Fame Resort Entertainment Co
General.Description: Hall of Fame Resort & Entertainment Company, a resort and entertainment company, doing business as the Pro Football Hall of Fame. The company owns the DoubleTree by Hilton located in downtown Canton, and the Hall of Fame Village, which is a multi-use sports, entertainment, and media destination. The company is headquartered in Canton, Ohio.
General.Address: 2014 Champions Gateway, Canton, OH, United States, 44708
